lines.text: I will take you places you've never been. I will show you things that you have never seen and I will see the life run out of you.
Dance with me, you little toad.
It was as if she had never been here. As if it had never happened.
If only we'd been 30 instead of 20.
Imagine her waiting for you all these years. Imagine her sleeping under ice and snow... waiting.
Good Lord, she's in the pond!
And you will be, too. Dead and wet and cold.
